assessments.status_rationale: No official October 2025 U.S. Core CPI print was reported in today's coverage, and the release is typically mid-November; the deadline has not passed.
No Euro area Q3 2025 flash GDP figure appears in today's news; the report is expected around Oct 31 and has not been cited.
There is no mention of Amazon’s Q3 2025 AWS reported growth in the provided articles; earnings results were not covered.
Meta’s Q3 2025 Reality Labs operating loss was not reported today; the news focused on layoffs and privacy oversight, not earnings.
No evidence in the articles indicates the 10-year Treasury yield closed at or below 4.10%; the time window remains open through Nov 30.
The news does not provide EUR/USD levels; no confirmation that 1.0600 was reached within the window.
While new U.S. sanctions on Russia could influence crude prices, no settlement at or above $86 was reported.
There is no report of an S&P 500 daily drop of at least 1.8% in today’s coverage; the window remains open through Nov 30.
TSMC’s October 2025 monthly revenue has not been released; typical disclosure occurs in early November and is not referenced here.
No JOLTS September 2025 figure is cited; the release is expected in early November and may be affected by the government shutdown.
No settlement levels for Dutch TTF are provided; no confirmation of a close at or below €34/MWh.
